content.json:
##### Change log 1.0 - Initial version.
1.1 - Added data for non-interactive logons. Layout change.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName contains "{UserName}"
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName contains "{UserName}"
    )
| summarize Interactive = countif(Category == "SignInLogs"), NonInteractive = countif(Category == "NonInteractiveUserSignInLogs") by UserPrincipalName
| sort by Interactive, NonInteractive desc
content.title: Total number of failed logons  - Top {NumberOfRecords} (select user to display details)

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1'))
| summarize SuccesfullLogons = countif(ResultType in ("0", "50125", "50140")),
    BadLogonsInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "SignInLogs"), 
    BadLogonsNonInteractive = countif(ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140") and Category == "NonInteractiveUserSignInLogs") by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Logons accross time for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
    | extend LocationDetails = todynamic(LocationDetails))
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IPAddress, Country = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion), 
    State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| project IPAddress, FailedLogons, Country, State, City
| order by FailedLogons
content.title: IP addresses list for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1')
| union (AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    | where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
    | where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
    | where IPAddress !in ('127.0.0.1', '::1'))
| summarize FailedLogons = count() by IPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Bad logons per source IP for {AccountName}

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, ResultType, ResultDescription, IPAddress, ResourceDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, 
    AuthenticationRequirement, AppDisplayName, Country = LocationDetails.countryOrRegion, City = LocationDetails.city
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Event details for {AccountName} - Interactive

content.query:
AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ @"{AccountName}"
| where ResultType !in ("0", "50125", "50140")
| extend Location = todynamic(LocationDetails)
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, ResultType, ResultDescription, IPAddress, ResourceDisplayName, ClientAppUsed, 
    AuthenticationRequirement, AppDisplayName, Country = Location.countryOrRegion, City = Location.city
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Event details for {AccountName} - Non Interactive
